message.body: Hey, I'm sorry I flaked here! It was too short a trip. Maybe we'll see you in fairfax sometime? My mom said to ask where Robert is these days.
It's okay. Well get together eventually. Robert is moving to Fairfax in a couple weeks
It was great! A friend's family has a house in corolla & we've been going the week after labor day. It blows my mind how much it's changed since we were kids!
Yeah. Do you ever come with your family anymore?

Nah, we started going to other beaches bc of epic Saturday obx traffic, & now with Alex and I both out of the house...I was wishing they could see how it is now though! A lot more ice cream places, that's one plus.
The best one is kill devils frozen custard
Agreed, we went there twice! So do you live there year round?
You went there twice while you you were here this time? I live like 5 minutes away. Ive been bouncing around a lot. Moved here in 07 for like 3 years.
Then in va for a couple. And been back here since november. Done a bit of fishing on the road too. Over the last 3 years I spent 3 months in Alaska
